resources.string: Downloading all points of interest \nThis may take a while
This application started as an example to showcase what\'s possible in Android and got slightly out of hand
If you like my work, feel free to drop me a Ko-Fi

This app uses stock images from pexel 
 https://www.pexels.com/photo-license/ 

Comic murals come from the open data platform of Brussels, 
https://bruxellesdata.opendatasoft.com/page/home/ 

This data falls under the EtaLab open license 
https://www.etalab.gouv.fr/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/Licence_Ouverte.pdf
